channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- All-in-One Addons for Elementor – WidgetKit
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- All-in-One Addons for Elementor – WidgetKit

item.title: CVE-2021-24267|2024-08-03T19:28:22.699Z -- unknown -- all-in-one%20addons%20for%20elementor%20%E2%80%93%20widgetkit
item.description: The “All-in-One Addons for Elementor – WidgetKit” WordPress Plugin before 2.3.10 has several widgets that are vulnerable to stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) by lower-privileged users such as contributors, all via a similar method.
